lead_paragraph: HOFSTEIN--Sadie (nee Rurka), March 6, 2016. Working with the orphans of the Bergen-Belsen Concentration Camp on behalf of the Jewish Relief Unit, former Executive Director of the Mental Health Association of Nassau County, NY, and, most recently, nine year President of the Residents Association of Wesley Enhanced Living-Main Line (formerly Martins Run), she dedicated her life to helping others. Beloved wife of the late Lawrence Hofstein. Devoted mother of David Hofstein (Gail) and the late Mitchell Hofstein. Loving grandmother of Diana Beyer (Jon) and Emily Hofstein. Dear great-grandmother of Henry and Lucy Beyer. Graveside services Tuesday 11:30am precisely at Mt. Ararat Cemetery, Farmingdale, NY. Memorial Services will be held on Sunday, April 17, 2016 at 3pm at Wesley Enhanced Living-Main Line, 100 Halcyon Drive, Media, PA 19063. Contributions may be made to the Residents Assistance Fund at Wesley Enhanced Living-Main Line or a charity of the donor's choice. Goldsteins' Rosenberg's Raphael-Sacks, Philadelphia, PA. 1/3
